T.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date,d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where (e.emp_no > 50000 and s.from_date > '1980-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Al%') or ( e.gender = 'M' and d.dept_no ='d002' and e.birth_date > '1950-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 50000 and d.dept_name = 'Production' and de.from_date > '1990-01-01');

F.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date,d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where (e.emp_no > 50000 and s.from_date > '1980-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Al%') or ( e.gender = 'M' and d.dept_no ='d002' and e.birth_date > '1950-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 50000 and d.dept_name = 'Production' and de.from_date > '1991-01-01')

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date,d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where (e.emp_no > 50000 and s.from_date > '1980-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Al%') or ( e.gender = 'M' and d.dept_no <'d002' and e.birth_date > '1950-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 50000 and d.dept_name = 'Production' and de.from_date > '1990-01-01')

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date,d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where (s.salary > 500000 and s.from_date > '1980-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Al%') or ( e.gender = 'M' and d.dept_no ='d002' and e.birth_date > '1950-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 50000 and d.dept_name = 'Production' and de.from_date > '1990-01-01')

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date,d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where (e.emp_no > 50000 and s.from_date > '1980-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Al%') or ( d.dept_no ='d002' and e.birth_date > '1950-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 50000 and d.dept_name = 'Production' and de.from_date > '1990-01-01')

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date,d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where (s.salary > 50000 and s.from_date > '1985-01-01' and e.last_name like 'A%') or ( e.gender = 'M' and d.dept_no ='d003' and e.birth_date > '1955-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%') or ( s.salary > 60000 and d.dept_name = 'Production' and de.from_date > '1991-01-01')
